ADD_EXECUTABLE (welsh-dragon welsh-dragon.cxx)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (welsh-dragon ${SimpleGVXR_LIBRARIES})

FILE (COPY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/welsh-dragon-small.stl
    DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})


SET (INSTALL_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/SimpleGVXR-examples")

INSTALL (TARGETS welsh-dragon
        RUNTIME
        DESTINATION ${INSTALL_DIR})

INSTALL (FILES welsh-dragon-small.stl
        DESTINATION ${INSTALL_DIR})

INSTALL (FILES welsh-dragon.py
        DESTINATION ${INSTALL_DIR}
        PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE
            GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
